title: The Cowboys Can’t Close, the 49ers Can’t Be Stopped, and More Week 12 Reactions | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Cowboys continue to underperform despite having one of the best rosters in the league and it’s time for a coaching change (0:30). Then, Stock Up led by the Seahawks’ win over the Eagles, Stock Down led by the Packers’ embarrassing performance in San Francisco, a challenge flag on tripping, and tomorrow’s headlines (18:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
